name: Odenavirus: Zombie Invasion
description:
Odenavirus: Zombie Invasion is an online turn-based combat game where the city is infested with zombies and you have to do missions and tasks to progress with the story.

Zombies, pets, robots, ghosts. Mistery, comedy, romance. A complex and touching plot with deep characters.

Main highlights:

  • Train and level up your pet
  • Unlock new skills for your pet to get stronger
  • Customize your character
  • Take care of your needs
  • Do missions to progress the storyline and unlock more scenarios and characters
  • Work to earn money
  • Buy items and set up your room however you want
  • Interact with other players
  • Create intimacy with the characters in the game[/]
